EmailTemplate.name: 3PT - What is Control? New
EmailTemplate.subject: What Is Control? In Under 3 Minutes.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/blog/demand-driven-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Are you experiencing true control?
Well, to answer that question we have to first understand what control is...and since words have never truly been our strong suit, we're going to let this video do the talking. <http://vmturbo.com/blog/demand-driven-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=3pt_love&utm_content=whiteboard>
- The VMTurbo Team
